languages.text:
Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon) and is equal to the highest {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} among enemies killed by the wearer this combat:
-<indent=5%>I–II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +<u>(2 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% critical hit chance until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: both of the above.</indent>

traits.locale_text: [draft] When the wielder kill the enemy with the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g} status, he gains {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} due to Hunt Down the Prey, counting the enemy's difficulty type equal to the maximum difficulty type of the enemies he killed in this combat.

Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon) and is equal to the highest {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} among enemies killed by the wearer this combat:
-<indent=5%>I–II : +25% of the Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × prey difficulty tier)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g} damage and +<u>(2 × prey difficulty tier)</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: both of the above</indent>

Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon) and is equal to the highest {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} among enemies killed by the wearer this combat:
-<indent=5%>I–II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +<u>(2 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% critical hit chance until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: both of the above.</indent>

languages.text:
每当装备者杀死一名{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}时，都可以获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果，效果持续至战斗结束。加成效果取决于敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}（即敌人图标上的罗马数字），等同于装备者在此场战斗内杀死所有敌人的最高{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}：
- <indent=5%>I-II：装备者获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的25%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>III-IV：装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}提高<u>（10×猎物难度等级）</u>%，暴击率提高<u>（2×猎物难度等级）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
- <indent=5%>V-VII：以上两项效果均生效。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon) and is equal to the highest {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} among enemies killed by the wearer this combat:
-<indent=5%>I–II : +25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +<u>(2 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: both of the above.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者杀死一名{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}时，都可以获得1层加成效果，效果持续至战斗结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}加成效果取决于敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}（即敌人图标上的罗马数字），等同于装备者在此场战斗内杀死所有敌人的最高{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}：
- <indent=5%>I-II：装备者获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的25%。</indent>
- <indent=5%>III-IV：装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击伤害{/g}提高<u>（10×猎物难度等级）</u>%，暴击率提高<u>（2×猎物难度等级）</u>%，效果持续至战斗结束。{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>V-VII：以上两项效果均生效。</indent>

languages.text:
着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}として指定されたターゲットを殺すたびに、戦闘終了まで累積{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。ボーナスは敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g} （敵のアイコン上のローマ数字）に依存し、着用者がこの戦闘で殺した敵の中で最も高い{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g}に等しい：
-<indent=5%>I-II：{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の+25%が{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的傷{/g}とされる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>III～IV：戦闘終了まで＋<u>（10×獲物の難易度レベル）</u>％ の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}と＋<u>（2×獲物の難易度レベル）</u>％のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}とされる。</indent>
-<indent=5%>V-VII：上記の両方。</indent>
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon) and is equal to the highest {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} among enemies killed by the wearer this combat:
-<indent=5%>I–II : +25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +<u>(2 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: both of the above.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}として指定されたターゲットを殺すたびに、戦闘終了まで累積{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。ボーナスは敵の{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g} （敵のアイコン上のローマ数字）に依存し、着用者がこの戦闘で殺した敵の中で最も高い{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}難易度レベル{/g}に等しい：
-<indent=5%>I-II：ハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の25％が{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的負傷{/g}となる</indent>
-<indent=5%>III～IV：戦闘終了まで＋<u>（10×獲物の難易度レベル）</u>％ の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット{/g}ダメージと＋<u>（2×獲物の難易度レベル）</u>％のクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}ヒット率{/g}となる</indent>
-<indent=5%>V-VII：上記の両方</indent>

languages.text:
Cuando el portador mata a un objetivo marcado como {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}, obtiene una bonificación acumulable hasta el final del combate. La bonificación depende del {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del enemigo (el número romano del icono del enemigo) y se basa en el {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} más alto de los enemigos abatidos por el portador en este combate:
-<indent=5%>I-II : +25 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del cazarrecompensas como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>III-IV: +<u>(10 × nivel de desafío de la presa)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} y +<u>(2 × nivel de desafío de la presa)</u> % de probabilidad de impacto crítico hasta el final del combate.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V-VII: las dos ventajas anteriores.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon) and is equal to the highest {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} among enemies killed by the wearer this combat:

-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +<u>(2 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: both of the above.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Cuando el portador mata a un objetivo marcado como {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g}, obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulable hasta el final del combate. La bonificación depende del {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} del enemigo (el número romano del icono del enemigo y se basa en el {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} más alto de los enemigos abatidos por el portado en este combate:
-<indent=5%>I-II : +25 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del cazador como {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>III-IV: +<u>(10 × nivel de desafío de la presa)</u> % de daño de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}impacto crítico{/g} y +<u>(2 × nivel de desafío de la presa)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico hasta el final del combate</indent>
-<indent=5%>V-VII: las dos ventajas anteriores</indent>

languages.text:
Immer wenn der Träger ein als {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} markiertes Ziel tötet, erhält er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen Bonus, der gestacked werden kann. Der Bonus hängt von der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} (der römischen Zahl auf dem Symbol des Feindes) der Feinde ab und entspricht der höchsten {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} der vom Träger in diesem Kampf getöteten Feinde:
-<indent=5%>I – II: +25 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>III – IV: +<u>(10 × Beute-Schwierigkeitsstufe)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischer Schaden{/g} und +<u>(2 × Beute-Schwierigkeitsstufe)</u> % kritische Trefferchance bis zum Ende des Kampfes.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V – VII: Beide der oben genannten.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a stackable bonus until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon) and is equal to the highest {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} among enemies killed by the wearer this combat:
-<indent=5%>I–II : +25% of the Bounty Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +<u>(2 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% critical hit chance until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: both of the above.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Der Jäger kann im Kampf beliebige Feinde als {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g} markieren. Wann immer er ein als Beute markiertes Ziel tötet, erlangt er bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen sich aufaddierenden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}, dessen Höhe sich an der {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} (der römischen Zahl auf dem Symbol des Feindes) richtet und der höchsten {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} der vom Träger in diesem Kampf getöteten Feinde entspricht :
-<indent=5%>I-II: +25 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Jägers als {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>III-IV: +<u>(10× Beute-Schwierigkeitsstufe)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}kritischer Trefferschaden{/g} und +<u>(2× Beute-Schwierigkeitsstufe)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}kritische Trefferchance{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes</indent>
-<indent=5%>V-VII: Beide der obenstehenden</indent>

languages.text:
Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает суммирующийся бонус, который сохраняется до конца боя. Этот бонус зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранга{/g} противника (римская цифра на иконке врага) и равен максимальному {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангу{/g} среди противников, убитых персонажем в этом бою.
-<indent=5%>I–II: +25% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × ранг добычи)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическому урону{/g} и +<u>(2 × ранг добычи)</u>% к шансу критического попадания до конца боя.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: оба указанных выше бонуса.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon) and is equal to the highest {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} among enemies killed by the wearer this combat:
-<indent=5%>I–II : +25% of the Hunter's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × prey difficulty tier)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}critical hit{/g} damage and +<u>(2 × prey difficulty tier)</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: both of the above</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g}, который сохраняется до конца боя. Этот бонус зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранга{/g} противника (римская цифра на иконке врага) и равен максимальному {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангу{/g} среди противников, убитых персонажем в этом бою.
-<indent=5%>I–II: +25% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × ранг цели)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическому урону{/g} и +<u>(2 × ранг цели)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}шансу критического попадания{/g} до конца боя</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: оба указанных выше бонуса</indent>

Убив цель, отмеченную как {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g}, персонаж получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g}, который сохраняется до конца боя. Этот бонус зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранга{/g} противника (римская цифра на иконке врага) и равен максимальному {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангу{/g} среди противников, убитых персонажем в этом бою.
-<indent=5%>I–II: +25% от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × ранг цели)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}критическому урону{/g} и +<u>(2 × ранг цели)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}шансу критического попадания{/g} до конца боя</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: оба указанных выше бонуса</indent>

languages.text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine une cible désignée comme une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g}, il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulable jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus dépend du {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi (niveau représenté par un chiffre romain sur l'icône de celui-ci) et correspond au {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} le plus élevé de tous les ennemis éliminés par l'utilisateur lors de ce combat :
-<indent=5%>I–II : +25 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Chasseur{/g} transformées en {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV : +<u>(10 × niveau de difficulté de la proie)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et +<u>(2 × niveau de difficulté de la proie)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII : les deux bonus précédents.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer kills a target marked as {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g}, they gain a stackable {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} until the end of combat. The bonus depends on the enemy {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} (the roman numeral on the enemy's icon) and is equal to the highest {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} among enemies killed by the wearer this combat:
-<indent=5%>I–II : +25% of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>III–IV: +<u>(10 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and +<u>(2 × prey's difficulty tier)</u>% critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} until the end of combat.</indent>
-<indent=5%>V–VII: both of the above.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur élimine une cible désignée comme une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g}, il obtient un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulable jusqu'à la fin du combat. Ce bonus dépend du {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi (niveau représenté par un chiffre romain sur l'icône de celui-ci) et correspond au {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} le plus élevé de tous les ennemis éliminés par l'utilisateur lors de ce combat :
- <indent=5%>I–II : +25 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} du Chasseur transformées en {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>III–IV : +<u>(10 × niveau de difficulté de la proie)</u> % de dégâts infligés par les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}coups critiques{/g} et +<u>(2 × niveau de difficulté de la proie)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} critique jusqu'à la fin du combat</indent>
- <indent=5%>V–VII : les deux bonus précédents</indent>
